{"id":753181240,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1658433001,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/753181240/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"20.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int n = height.size();\n        vector <int> maxleft ,maxright ;\n        maxleft.resize(n);maxright.resize(n);\n        \n        int ans =0;\n        maxleft[0] = height[0];\n        for(int i =1 ;i<n;i++){\n            maxleft[i] = max(maxleft[i-1],height[i]);\n        }\n        \n        maxright[n-1] =height[n-1];\n        for(int i = n-2 ;i>=0 ;i--){\n            maxright[i] = max(maxright[i+1],height[i]);\n        }\n        \n        for(int i =0 ;i<n;i++){\n            ans += min(maxright[i],maxleft[i]) - height[i];\n        }\n        return ans ;\n        \n        \n        \n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
